com.adobe.primetime.va.simple

Class MediaHeartbeat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.primetime.va.simple.MediaHeartbeat

  • public class MediaHeartbeat
extends java.lang.Object
    MediaSDK public API class.
    Version:
    2.2.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MediaHeartbeat.AdMetadataKeys
      These constant strings define standard metadata keys for ads.
      static class  MediaHeartbeat.AudioMetadataKeys
      These constant strings define standard metadata keys for audio content.
      static class  MediaHeartbeat.Event
      These enumeration values define the type of a tracking event
      static interface  MediaHeartbeat.MediaHeartbeatDelegate
      Interface defining protocol for fetching regular playhead updates and QoS values from media player.
      static class  MediaHeartbeat.MediaObjectKey
      These constant strings define media/ad info keys used for MediaObject.
      static class  MediaHeartbeat.MediaType
      These enumeration values define the type of media
      static class  MediaHeartbeat.StreamType
      These constant strings define the stream type of the main content that is currently tracked.
      static class  MediaHeartbeat.VideoMetadataKeys
      These constant strings define standard metadata keys for video content.

      • MediaHeartbeat

        public MediaHeartbeat(MediaHeartbeat.MediaHeartbeatDelegate delegate,
                      MediaHeartbeatConfig config)
        Creates an instance of MediaHeartbeat class with provided delegate
        Parameters:
        delegate - MediaHeartbeatDelegate instance returning valid playhead and QoS updates
        config - MediaHeartbeatConfig instance with valid config values

    • Method Detail

      • createMediaObject

        public static MediaObject createMediaObject(java.lang.String name,
                                            java.lang.String mediaId,
                                            java.lang.Double length,
                                            java.lang.String streamType)
        Deprecated. - Use createMediaObject(String, String, Double, String, MediaType) instead
        Creates an instance of the video info object
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the media
        mediaId - The unqiue identifier for the media
        length - The length of the media in seconds
        streamType - The stream type as a string. Use MediaHeartbeat.StreamType for predefined streams.

      • createMediaObject

        public static MediaObject createMediaObject(java.lang.String name,
                                            java.lang.String mediaId,
                                            java.lang.Double length,
                                            java.lang.String streamType,
                                            MediaHeartbeat.MediaType mediaType)
        Creates an instance of the media info object for Audio or Video streams
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the media
        mediaId - The unqiue identifier for the media
        length - The length of the media in seconds
        streamType - The stream type as a string. Use MediaHeartbeat.StreamType for predefined streams.
        mediaType - The media type

      • createAdBreakObject

        public static MediaObject createAdBreakObject(java.lang.String name,
                                              java.lang.Long position,
                                              java.lang.Double startTime)
        Creates an instance of the AdBreak info object
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the ad break
        position - The position of the ad break in the content starting with 1
        startTime - The start time of the ad break relative to the main media

      • createAdObject

        public static MediaObject createAdObject(java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String adId,
                                         java.lang.Long position,
                                         java.lang.Double length)
        Creates an instance of the Ad info object
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the ad
        adId - The unique id for the ad
        position - The start position of the ad
        length - The length of the ad in seconds

      • createChapterObject

        public static MediaObject createChapterObject(java.lang.String name,
                                              java.lang.Long position,
                                              java.lang.Double length,
                                              java.lang.Double startTime)
        Creates an instance of the Chapter info object
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the chapter
        position - The position of the chapter
        length - The length of the chapter in seconds
        startTime - The start of the chapter relative to the main media

      • createQoSObject

        public static MediaObject createQoSObject(java.lang.Long bitrate,
                                          java.lang.Double startupTime,
                                          java.lang.Double fps,
                                          java.lang.Long droppedFrames)
        Creates an instance of the QoS info object
        Parameters:
        bitrate - The bitrate of media in bits per second
        startupTime - The start up time of media in seconds
        fps - The current frames per second information
        droppedFrames - The number of dropped frames so far

      • createTimedMetadataObject

        public static MediaObject createTimedMetadataObject(java.lang.String metadata)
        Creates an instance of the Timed Metadata media object
        Parameters:
        metadata - The timed metadata string value

      • version

        public static java.lang.String version()
        Gets the version.
        Returns:
        a string containing the version value.

      • trackSessionStart

        public void trackSessionStart(MediaObject mediaInfo,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> contextData)
        Method to track the start of viewing session.
        Parameters:
        mediaInfo - A valid MediaObject instance created using createMediaObject(String, String, Double, String, MediaType).
        contextData - An optional map containing the context data to be tracked.

      • trackPlay

        public void trackPlay()
        Method to track media play or resume after pause.

      • trackPause

        public void trackPause()
        Method to track media pause.

      • trackComplete

        public void trackComplete()
        Method to track completion of media.

      • trackSessionEnd

        public void trackSessionEnd()
        Method to track the end of a viewing session. This method must be called even if the user does not watch the video to completion.

      • trackError

        public void trackError(java.lang.String errorId)
        Method to track Player Errors. * @param errorId Error Id

      • trackEvent

        public void trackEvent(MediaHeartbeat.Event event,
                       MediaObject info,
                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> contextData)
        Method to track optional media events.
        Parameters:
        event - Event type.
        info - A valid MediaObject instance containing event info for MediaHeartbeat.Event.AdBreakStart, MediaHeartbeat.Event.AdStart and MediaHeartbeat.Event.ChapterStart
        contextData - An optional map containing context data to be tracked for MediaHeartbeat.Event.AdStart and MediaHeartbeat.Event.ChapterStart events.
